TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit RolePrincipal extends System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class RolePrincipal Inherits ClaimsPrincipal Implements ISerializable
type RolePrincipal = class inherit ClaimsPrincipal interface ISerializable

summary.span: 表示目前 HTTP 要求的安全性資訊，包括角色成員資格。

span.span: Represents security information for the current HTTP request, including role membership.

summary.span: 此類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會實作介面，並表示 HTTP 要求的目前安全性內容。The object implements the interface and represents the current security context for the HTTP request. 當啟用角色管理 (請參閱)，則指派物件屬性 。When role management is enabled (see ), the assigns a object to the property of the . 類別會公開目前 HTTP 要求的安全性識別和角色成員資格，此外會執行檢查。The class exposes the security identity for the current HTTP request and additionally performs checks for role membership. 如果已`true`，則物件會管理快取的角色清單，以及查閱中的快取的目前使用者的角色成員資格然後第一，列出角色。If is `true`, then the object manages the cached list of roles and looks up role membership for the current user in the cached list first, then the role . 如果已`false`，則物件一律會使用角色提供者的角色成員資格查詢。If is `false`, the object always looks up role membership using the role provider. 物件來加密及解密所識別的 cookie 中快取的角色資訊根據。The object encrypts and decrypts role information cached in the cookie identified by the based on the .

summary.span: 取得值，指出使用 物件快取的角色名稱清單是否已修改過。

span.span: if the list of role names cached with the object has been modified; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回`true`角色名稱已從預設角色擷取之後，並加入所快取方法，或當方法呼叫方法預設角色提供者，以及收到的回應時再`true`，產生的角色名稱傳遞給加入快取的方法。The property will return `true` after role names have been retrieved from the default role and added to the cache by the method, or when the method calls the method of the default role provider and then receives a response of `true`, resulting in the role name passed to the method being added to the cache. 屬性也會傳回為 true，則如果設為`true`並經過後，產生新所設定。The property will also return true if is set to `true` and the has passed, resulting in a new being set. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示目前使用者的角色快取的資訊，如果已啟用角色管理。The following example displays role-caching information for the current user if role management is enabled. 如需啟用角色管理的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For information on enabling role management, see the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/getroleinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/getroleinfovb.aspx#1)]

The default is /.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性傳回的值`cookiePath`從您的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案的屬性。The property returns the value of the `cookiePath` attribute from the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. 如需有關 cookie 路徑的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on cookie paths, see . ## Examples 下列範例會顯示目前使用者的角色快取的資訊，如果已啟用角色管理。The following example displays role-caching information for the current user if role management is enabled. 如需啟用角色管理的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For information on enabling role management, see the class. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string[] GetRoles() cil managed

summary.span: 取得 所屬的角色清單。

span.span: Gets a list of roles that the is a member of.
The list of roles that the is a member of.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已`true`並已快取角色名稱所表示的使用者，然後在方法會傳回使用者為成員的快取中的角色名稱的清單。If is `true` and role names have been cached for the user represented by the , then the method will return the list of role names in the cache that the user is a member of. 如果沒有已快取角色名稱，則方法會傳回角色名稱的清單，使用者就會是從預設角色的成員。If role names have not been cached, then the method returns the list of role names that the user is a member of from the default role . 只有目前的角色名稱會傳回。Only role names for the current are returned. 若要判斷角色名稱是否已快取中物件，檢查屬性。To determine whether role names have been cached in the object, check the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示登入的使用者角色的成員。The following code example displays the roles that the logged-on user is a member of. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/GetRolescs.aspx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/GetRolesvb.aspx#7)]

abstract member IsInRole : string -> bool override this.IsInRole : string -> bool

span.span: The role to search for.

summary.span: 取得值，指出 表示的使用者是否在指定的角色中。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the user represented by the is in the specified role.

returns.span: 如果 表示的使用者在指定的角色中，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if user represented by the is in the specified role; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會先檢查屬性來判斷是否可快取的目前使用者的角色名稱清單。 first checks the property to determine whether a cached list of role names for the current user is available. 如果屬性是`true`，快取的清單會檢查指定的角色。If the property is `true`, the cached list is checked for the specified role. 如果方法會快取的清單中找到指定的角色，它會傳回`true`。If the method finds the specified role in the cached list, it returns `true`. 如果找不到指定的角色，它會呼叫方法的預設執行個體，以判斷是否已設定資料來源的角色相關聯的使用者名稱值。If does not find the specified role, it calls the method of the default instance to determine whether the user name is associated with a role from the data source for the configured value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會檢查使用者登入時是否在系統管理員角色中，然後才允許使用者檢視的使用者角色。The following code example checks to see whether the logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view user roles. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/ViewRolescs.aspx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/ViewRolesvb.aspx#8)]

public: property bool IsRoleListCached { bool get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得值，指出是否已在 Cookie 中快取使用者的角色清單。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the list of roles for the user has been cached in a cookie.

value.span: 如果已在 Cookie 中快取角色名稱，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if role names are cached in a cookie; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`cacheRolesInCookie`屬性 (attribute) 的 Web.config 檔案中的應用程式設定為`true`，則使用者具有特定角色的成員資格已核取時，將會寫入至 cookie 的一份目前使用者的角色名稱。If the `cacheRolesInCookie` attribute in the Web.config file for the application is set to `true`, then a list of role names for the current user is written to a cookie when user membership in a particular role is checked. 屬性會指出角色名稱是否已寫入至 cookie。The property indicates whether role names have been written to the cookie. 請注意，即使`cacheRolesInCookie`組態屬性可能`true`，則屬性不會傳回`true`直到角色資訊寫入至 cookie 後。Note that, even though the `cacheRolesInCookie` configuration attribute may be `true`, the property does not return `true` until after role information has been written to the cookie. 如果使用者，會執行的任何角色不檢查會傳回`false`。If no role checks are performed for a user, will return `false`. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示目前使用者的角色快取的資訊，如果已啟用角色管理。The following example displays role-caching information for the current user if role management is enabled. 如需啟用角色管理的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For information on enabling role management, see the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/getroleinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/getroleinfovb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 使用 ASP.NET 角色管理授權

span.span: Managing Authorization Using ASP.NET Roles

The that the roles cookie was issued.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會顯示目前使用者的角色快取的資訊，如果已啟用角色管理。The following example displays role-caching information for the current user if role management is enabled. 如需啟用角色管理的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For information on enabling role management, see the class. Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得角色提供者的名稱，用於儲存和擷取使用者的角色資訊。

span.span: Gets the name of the role provider that stores and retrieves role information for the user.

value.span: 角色提供者的名稱，用於儲存和擷取使用者的角色資訊。

span.span: The name of the role provider that stores and retrieves role information for the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會公開管理所表示的使用者角色資訊的角色提供者名稱物件。The property exposes the name of the role provider that manages the role information for the user represented by the object. 這可讓您藉由存取使用者特定的角色提供者執行個體屬性不論提供者是應用程式的預設提供者的類別。This enables you to access the specific role-provider instance for a user by using the property of the class regardless of whether the provider is the default provider for the application. 例如，您可以建立採用的方法做為輸入，並傳回表示使用者角色的清單。For example, you may create a method that takes a as input and returns the list of roles for the represented user. 您可以確保適當的角色提供者用來傳回清單中的角色藉由呼叫方法，角色提供者，從編製索引的集合屬性值。You can ensure that the appropriate role provider is used to return the list of roles for the by calling the method of the role provider from the collection that is indexed by the property value. 若要填入物件的每個要求，您必須使用應用程式的 Global.asax 檔案中定義的事件處理常式。To populate the object for each request, you must use a event handler defined in the Global.asax file for the application.

summary.span: 取得角色 Cookie 的版本號碼。

span.span: Gets the version number of the roles cookie.

value.span: 角色 Cookie 的版本號碼。

span.span: The version number of the roles cookie.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 藉由在角色 cookie 中包含版本號碼，未來的 ASP.NET 版本可以修改角色 cookie 的格式，並使用屬性來區別不同的格式。By including a version number in the roles cookie, future releases of ASP.NET can modify the format of the roles cookie and use the property to distinguish between different formats. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示目前使用者的角色快取的資訊，如果已啟用角色管理。The following example displays role-caching information for the current user if role management is enabled. 如需啟用角色管理的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For information on enabling role management, see the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/getroleinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/getroleinfovb.aspx#1)]
